chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.welcomeMessage: Ask me about your test results, eye health, or general vision questions.
chat.apiUnavailableHint: The API server is not configured. Contact the administrator to enable AI features.
chat.disclaimer: AI responses are for educational purposes only, not medical advice.

eye.selectPrompt: Which eye would you like to test?
eye.coverTip: Cover your other eye with your hand or an eye patch for accurate results.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This app is for educational screening purposes only and is NOT a medical diagnosis. Results are approximate and should not replace professional eye care. Always consult a qualified eye care professional for accurate assessment and treatment.
disclaimer.short: This app is for screening only—not a medical diagnosis. Always consult an eye care professional.

audio.autoPlayDescription: When enabled, audio instructions will play automatically when you enter a new screen.

voice.notSupported: Voice commands not supported in this browser
